dev.eternalformula.api.util

Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.eternalformula.api.util.Assets

  • public class Assets
extends java.lang.Object
    The amazing assets class. Provides a direct way to load and interact with assets (maps, atlases, etc.).
    Since:
    Alpha 0.0.2
